SELECT rr.id AS r_id, rr.location AS location, rr.reservation_date AS reservation_date, rr.start_time AS start_time, rr.end_time AS end_time, rr.price AS price, rr.user_id AS user_id, rr.created_on AS created_on, rr.is_app AS is_app, rr.purpose AS purpose, rr.group_name AS group_name, rr.equipment AS equipment, rr.head_count AS head_count,
u.email AS u_email, u.name AS u_name, u.birth AS u_birth, u.phone AS u_phone, u.cathedral AS u_cathedral, u.baptism_name AS u_baptism_name, u.statusCode AS u_status_code
